titles.title: Hydropower Capacity Improvement Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a tax credit for incremental hydropower for additional generating capacity and increased efficiency at existing dams licensed by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/2/2001--Introduced. Hydropower Capacity Improvement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) a tax credit through tax year 2011 for incremental hydropower for additional generating capacity and increased efficiency at existing dams licensed by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission; and (2) such credit for public utilities, certain organizations, and States, possessions, and Indian tribal governments. Permits credit assignment.
